column3: School of Mathematical and Computer Sciences
column5: Heriot-Watt University is recognised as an international leader in Robotics and its subdiscipline of Human-Robot Interaction. This research area exists within the broad domain of Artificial Intelligence and has been identified as one of the fastest growing areas for the UK.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, part time available
